Uses of Class
com.st.st25sdk.ndef.NDEFRecord

  • Packages that use NDEFRecord 
    Package Description
    com.st.st25sdk.ndef
    This package provides necessary classes to build NDEF messages.

    • Uses of NDEFRecord in com.st.st25sdk.ndef

      Subclasses of NDEFRecord in com.st.st25sdk.ndef 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AarRecord
      Implements AAR NDEF message (Android Application record) Introduced in Android 4.0 (API level 14), an Android Application Record (AAR) provides a stronger certainty that your application is started when an NFC tag is scanned You can add an AAR to any NDEF record of your NDEF message, because Android searches the entire NDEF message for AARs If it finds an AAR, it starts the application based on the package name inside the AAR If the application is not present on the device, Google Play is launched to download the application Refers to https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/connectivity/nfc/nfc.html#well_known
      class  BtLeRecord
      BtLeRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing Bluetooth Low Energy NDEF records Those records are used to implement Bluetooth Secure Simple Pairing (SSP) using NFC SSP describes the notion of OOB (Out Of Band) pairing, which exchanges Bluetooth OOB data over the NFC channel.
      class  BtRecord
      BtRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing Bluetooth NDEF records Those records are used to implement Bluetooth Secure Simple Pairing (SSP) using NFC SSP describes the notion of OOB (Out Of Band) pairing, which exchanges Bluetooth OOB data over the NFC channel.
      class  EmailRecord
      EmailRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing Email NDEF records As defined in NFC Forum, NDEF Email record are defined as an URI NDEF record with URI prefix = 0x06
      class  EmptyRecord
      Implements NFC Forum Empty NDEF record
      class  ExternalRecord
      Implements NFC Forum External NDEF record
      class  MimeRecord
      Implements NFC Forum MIME NDEF record
      class  SmsRecord
      Implements NFC Forum SMS URI NDEF record
      class  TextRecord
      Implements NFC Forum Text NDEF message Refers to NFCForum-TS-RTD_Text_1.0 http://members.nfc-forum.org/apps/group_public/document.php?document_id=5080
      class  UriRecord
      Implements NFC Forum RTD URI NDEF message
      class  VCardRecord
      Implements NFC Forum VCard NDEF message Refers to http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc6350 vCard Format Specification
      class  WifiRecord
      WifiRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing WiFi NDEF records Those records are used to implement WiFi Direct Device Pairing using NFC
